input.sentences: i went on vacation last weekend .
i got to eat a lot of great food .
i put a lot of hot sauce on it .
they were in very small cups .
i was still very hungry afterward .
output.sentences: The upcoming weekend meant the start of vacation for the woman.
She couldn't wait to relax and eat a lot of different food.
A lot of the dishes were garnered with hot sauce and tabasco.
The food was presented in sample cups.
Because of how much food was served, the lady swore she would never be hungry again afterward.
